alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pickens, northwestern Greene and north central Sumter Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New West Greene, or 9 miles south of Aliceville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Carrollton, Pickensville, Memphis, McMullen, Garden, New West Greene, Panola, West Greene, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Bevill Lock And Dam, Gainesville Lake Campground, Warsaw, Dillburg, George Downer Airport, Pleasant Ridge, Cochrane and Lewiston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
